value.title: Should police use facial-recognition technology? Ann Arbor to vote on issue
value.excerpt: ANN ARBOR, MI — Ann Arbor is once again considering restricting police use of a facial-recognition technology and city officials are planning to vote on the issue soon. City Council Member Linh Song, D-2nd Ward, advised her council colleagues July 17 to expect a resolution to come forward possibly in the next two months.

value.title: IBM Report Finds AI and Automation Reduce Costs of Data Breaches
value.excerpt: A new report from IBM reveals that organizations using AI and automation are likely to suffer lower losses from data breaches.

value.excerpt: Bringing a level of scrutiny to AI processes in healthcare, Marzyeh Ghassemi has some solutions for harmful bias in systems that, as a society, we want to root out.

value.title: Debunking observability myths – Part 1: Why you can’t skip monitoring and rely only on logs
value.excerpt:
In this blog post, we will shed light on a myth surrounding observability: "You can skip monitoring and rely on logs.”
The post Debunking observability myths – Part 1: Why you can’t skip monitoring and rely only on logs appeared first on IBM Blog.

value.title: HitPaw Introduces Online AI Video Translator: Breaking Language Barriers in Video Content

value.title: OpenAI scuttles AI-written text detector over ‘low rate of accuracy’
value.excerpt: Many perhaps unwisely relied on the tool to catch low-effort cheats, but OpenAI has retired it over its widely noted "low rate of accuracy."

value.title: I read the news today, oh bot! AI-generated anchors are making headlines in India
value.excerpt: Meet Lisa, a multilingual chatbot who reads the news headlines in India. What, you don't care for her monotone voice? Change the channel! Sana is the other network's AI-generated news anchor.

value.title: NYC is now using AI at some subway stations to track when and how fare evaders are getting through
value.excerpt: The M.T.A. said that the AI is only being used to generate reports and quantify fare evasion, not to identify fare evaders or assist law enforcement.

value.title: A translator for your kids: How using AI as a 'parenting co-pilot' will help parents communicate better
value.excerpt: With ChatGPT and other artificial intelligence tools, mom and dad can now access massive amounts of parenting knowledge at their fingertips.

value.title: ESRB Proposes Using Facial Recognition To Verify Your Age
value.excerpt: The Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) has asked the FTC for approval to use facial recognition technology to help determine how old a user is. Using something called Privacy-Protective Facial Estimation, a person's age would be estimated based on a photo to verify they are old enough to purchase a game.

value.title: Use generative AI foundation models in VPC mode with no internet connectivity using Amazon SageMaker JumpStart
value.excerpt: With recent advancements in generative AI, there are lot of discussions happening on how to use generative AI across different industries to solve specific business problems. Generative AI is a type of AI that can create new content and ideas, including conversations, stories, images, videos, and music.
